markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Human](/Traits.aspx?ID=90)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 633 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

A creature with this trait is a member of the [human](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=6) ancestry. Humans are a diverse array of people known for their adaptability. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by humans.
name: Human
